com.ibm.jaggr.service.readers

Class BuildListReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • com.ibm.jaggr.service.readers.AggregationReader
        • com.ibm.jaggr.service.readers.BuildListReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable

    public class BuildListReader
extends AggregationReader
    This class aggregates a set of IModule.Build objects and allows them to be read sequentially in the order that they occur in the list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuildListReader(List<ModuleBuildReader> list) 

    • Method Summary

      boolean hasErrors()
      Returns true if any of the ModuleReaders in this Future list had errors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildListReader

        public BuildListReader(List<ModuleBuildReader> list)
        Parameters:
        list - The list of build readers

    • Method Detail

      • hasErrors

        public boolean hasErrors()
        Returns true if any of the ModuleReaders in this Future list had errors. This flag is valid only after all the futures in the list have completed and the contents of each reader have been read.
        Returns:
        True if any reader had errors
